entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
